column2: Your loyal ghoul [From.GetTitledFirstName] gives you a gift of gold.
Gold is good.
Such a paltry sum!
Your loyal ghoul [From.GetTitledFirstName] has presented you with a rare artifact to show [From.GetPossPronoun] devotion.
Wonderful!
Bah! What is theirs is mine.
Your loyal ghoul [From.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to increase your influence provided you can fund their efforts.
Influence Supernatural Society.
Influence Mortal Society.
Influence Jyhad.
There is no need at this time.
One of your ghouls has become very jealous of another to the point of open rivalry.
My attention is important.
May the strongest survive.
Your ghoul [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been kidnapped and imprisoned!
Who dares to kidnap my servants?!?
Like I care.  [From.GetSheHeCap] can rot!
Your ghoul, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been found dead.  The cause appears to be suicide.
[From.GetSheHeCap] was a good servant.
Idiot.

They came from nowhere.  A group of assassins fell upon your entourage intent on reaching and killing you.  The battle was swift, brutal and deadly.  You survived.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not - giving [From.GetPossPronoun] life to defend you.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] did well and will be missed.
That's the job.
You have noticed recently that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been snapping at underlings and having trouble controlling their anger lately.
Hmm.
All I care about are results.
Your ghoul [From.GetTitledFirstName] has raised an army using their mortal connections to seize power from you!
Sometimes they must learn the hard way.
Your ghoul, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has come to you severely injured and asked for help to heal [From.GetPossPronoun] wounds.
Good servants are hard to find. (Will increase bloodthirst)
[From.GetTitledFirstName] better figure it out on [From.GetPossPronoun] own.
Your ghoul, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has come to you to ask if you would ghoul [From.GetPossPronoun] spouse.
Yes. (Will increase bloodthirst)
No.
Your ghoul, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has come to you to ask for more of your blood than normal. [From.GetTitledFirstName] is feeling weaker than normal.
Yes. (Will increase bloodthirst)
No.
Your ghoul, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has petitioned you for the embrace.
Yes. Welcome to eternity, my childe.(Will increase bloodthirst)
No. You are not worthy.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was a loyal ghoul to your predecessor.  They have petitioned you to become your Ghoul.
Yes. Loyalty is rewarded.(Will increase bloodthirst)
No. You are not worthy.
